faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I change plans at any time?
faq.a1: Yes, you can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel your subscription at any time from the app settings.
faq.q2: What happens if I cancel my subscription?
faq.a2: You keep access to premium features until the end of your billing period, then your account automatically reverts to the free plan.
faq.q3: Is the Lifetime plan really for life?
faq.a3: Yes! A single payment gives you access to all Pro features forever, without any recurring subscription.

1.title: 1. Publisher
1.content: The Re:mind application is published by Antoine Granier, an independent developer residing in France.

2.title: 2. Collection of Personal Data
2.p1: Re:mind does not collect any personal data. No name, email address, phone number, or any other information about you is recorded, stored, or transmitted to third parties.
2.p2: The application works exclusively locally on your device. All data (reminders, medical treatments) remain on your phone and are never transmitted to external servers.
2.p3: The application also offers auto-renewable subscriptions. To manage these subscriptions, certain information may be collected, including identifiers linked to Apple App Store or Google Play platforms, without banking data being stored locally.
2.p4: Subscription data is used solely for service management, billing, and fraud prevention.
2.p5: You benefit from GDPR rights relating to this data, including access, rectification, and deletion via the relevant platforms.
2.p6: Any change in subscription management will be subject to an update of this policy.

3.title: 3. Geolocation
3.p1: The only data used is background geolocation, only if you enable the toll passage detection feature.
list: Is used only to create toll payment reminders
Is not stored or shared with third parties
Can be disabled at any time in the app or phone settings

4.title: 4. Third-Party Services
4.p1: No third-party services (analytics, advertising, external API, push notifications) are currently integrated into the application.
4.p2: If third-party services or advertising were added in the future, this privacy policy would be updated and displayed in the application.

5.title: 5. Your Rights (GDPR)
5.p1: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:
list: Right of access to your personal data
5.p2: However, these rights do not apply in the context of Re:mind because no personal data is collected, stored, or processed by the publisher, except for subscription management as described.
5.contact: For any questions regarding your data, contact:

6.title: 6. Retention Period
6.p1: No data is retained by the publisher directly. All information created in the application (reminders, treatments) remains solely on your device until you delete it or uninstall the application.
6.p2: Data related to subscriptions is retained according to the rules of the Apple and Google platforms.

7.title: 7. Modifications
7.content: This privacy policy may be modified at any time. Modifications will be directly visible in the application. It is advisable to consult this page regularly.

8.title: 8. Applicable Law
8.content: This policy is subject to French law.
